mapper.insert: insert into mem_stbl(memIdx,memID,memPassword,memName,memAge,memGender,memEmail,memProfile) values((select NVL(max(memID)+1,1 from mem_stbl mem), #{memID},#{memPassword},#{memName},#{memAge},#{memGender},#{memEmail},#{memProfile})
mapper.select: select * from mem_stbl where memID=#{memID} and memPassword=#{memPassword}
mapper.update: update mem_stbl set memPassword=#{memPassword}, memName=#{memName}, memAge=#{memAge},memGender=#{memGender}, memEmail=#{memEmail} where memID=#{memID}
update mem_stbl set memProfile=#{memProfile} where memID=#{memID}
